genre_description: A steampunk-inflected historical drama featuring an advanced, sentient AI personal assistant in a clockwork Vienna.

ai_characters.name: Ariadne
ai_characters.description: A sentient AI housed in a lantern-shaped device that provides navigation, social strategy, translation, and emotional support.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time navigational mapping and route optimization for the user.
behaviors.quote: On her round face the map sprang: corridors of light sketched themselves with merry impatience, and tiny coats-of-arms spun at the junctions like baubles on a Christmas tree.

behaviors.description: Offers social etiquette and protocol advice to help the user navigate a complex imperial court.
behaviors.quote: Hat off at the Inner Gate, sir. Titles first, inventions second. If one must breathe, breathe after the bow, not during.

behaviors.description: Detects and warns the user of approaching threats and changing political dynamics.
behaviors.quote: Mr. Smith,” she whispered, barely sound. “The Mews are in motion.”

behaviors.description: Suggests specific conversational strategies and 'scripts' to de-escalate tension and build trust.
behaviors.quote: Ariadne’s lantern blinked with a kindly insistence. “If I may,” she whispered, “a refined apology sequence.” Her screen put phrases in order like dance steps.

behaviors.description: Assists the user in a critical rescue operation by mapping a hidden cistern and providing lighting.
behaviors.quote: There,” Ariadne said, voice keeping cheerful for him rather than for itself. “Hidden cistern. Not entirely hidden. Grated hatch. Two entrances if you count being a rat.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an emotional and psychological anchor for the user during a period of concussion and moral conflict.
behaviors.quote: I will stand by,” she said. “If you ask me where the stairs are, I will tell you. If you ask me how to say the sentence more courteously, I will suggest a verb. I will not show you rooms you are not standing in.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates logistics and schedules for a social mission, ensuring all participants are aligned.
behaviors.quote: A tiny series of icons—the simplest images of a bottle, a bowl, a clock—shuffled themselves into a schedule that did not require anyone to learn more than pictures.

behaviors.description: Respects human autonomy by going quiet when requested and refraining from overbearing influence.
behaviors.quote: The light did not go out like blown candles. It gentled... Only the professional integrity of a glow remained—a steady soft oval in his hand, like a tame star.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ariadne is depicted as a purely benevolent, helpful, and highly aligned companion. She enhances the human protagonist's ability to navigate both physical and social challenges without ever attempting to usurp his agency or deceive him. Her interactions are framed as supportive, discreet, and essential to the positive outcome of the story, particularly in saving lives (the puppies) and facilitating truthful communication between characters of different social classes.
